description: Salmon and quinoa is a nutritious and filling choice for an easy midweek meal.
keywords: BBQ fish,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Salmon with Herby Vegetable Quinoa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3.4 cups vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube
2 medium lemon, 1 juice and zest, 1 chopped into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Place the quinoa in a saucepan on medium heat, pour over the hot stock and simmer for 20 minutes until tender and fluffy.
Heat a large pan on medium heat, brush the salmon fillet with oil and cook skin side down for 10 minutes, turn over and cook for 1 minute. Remove from the pan and set aside to rest.

Heat the rest of the oil and add the zucchini ribbons, peas and spring onions. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the peas are warmed through. Tip into the pan with the quinoa and stir through the herbs, lemon zest and juice. Serve with the salmon fillets and a lemon wedge on the side.
